## Events.CommentMove class

Notifies listeners that a workspace comment has moved.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class CommentMove extends CommentBase 
```
**Extends:** [CommentBase](./blockly.events_namespace.commentbase_class.md)

<tr><td>

[oldCoordinate\_?](./blockly.events_namespace.commentmove_class.oldcoordinate__property.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

[Coordinate](./blockly.utils_namespace.coordinate_class.md)


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ The location of the comment before the move, in workspace coordinates.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[reason?](./blockly.events_namespace.commentmove_class.reason_property.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

string\[\]


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ An explanation of what this move is for. Known values include: 'drag' -- A drag operation completed. 'snap' -- Comment got shifted to line up with the grid. 'inbounds' -- Block got pushed back into a non-scrolling workspace. 'create' -- Block created via deserialization. 'cleanup' -- Workspace aligned top-level blocks. Event merging may create multiple reasons: \['drag', 'inbounds', 'snap'\].


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[type](./blockly.events_namespace.commentmove_class.type_property.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

EventType


</td><td>


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
